member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventProvider.#ctor(System.Guid)
member.summary: Constructor for EventProvider class.
member.param: Unique GUID among all trace sources running on a system

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventProvider.EtwRegister
member.summary: This method registers the controlGuid of this class with ETW. We need to be running on Vista or above. If not an PlatformNotSupported exception will be thrown. If for some reason the ETW EtwRegister call failed a NotSupported exception will be thrown.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventProvider.Close
member.summary: This method deregisters the controlGuid of this class with ETW.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventProvider.Deregister
member.summary: This method un-registers from ETW.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventProvider.IsEnabled
member.summary: IsEnabled, method used to test if provider is enabled.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventProvider.IsEnabled(System.Byte,System.Int64)
member.summary: IsEnabled, method used to test if event is enabled.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventProvider.WriteMessageEvent(System.String,System.Byte,System.Int64)
member.summary: WriteMessageEvent, method to write a string with level and Keyword. The activity ID will be propagated only if the call stays on the same native thread as SetActivityId().

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventProvider.WriteMessageEvent(System.String)
member.summary: WriteMessageEvent, method to write a string with level=0 and Keyword=0 The activity ID will be propagated only if the call stays on the same native thread as SetActivityId().

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventProvider.WriteEvent(System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventDescriptor@,System.Object[])
member.summary: WriteEvent method to write parameters with event schema properties.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventProvider.WriteEvent(System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventDescriptor@,System.String)
member.summary: WriteEvent, method to write a string with event schema properties.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventProvider.WriteEvent(System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventDescriptor@,System.Int32,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: WriteEvent, method to be used by generated code on a derived class.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventProvider.WriteTransferEvent(System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventDescriptor@,System.Guid,System.Object[])
member.summary: WriteTransferEvent, method to write a parameters with event schema properties.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventProviderTraceListener.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: This method creates an instance of the ETW provider. The guid argument must be a valid GUID or a format exception will be thrown when creating an instance of the ControlGuid. We need to be running on Vista or above. If not an PlatformNotSupported exception will be thrown by the EventProvider.

member.summary: Evt Variant types.

member.summary: The query flags to get information about query.

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:DotNetEventingStrings.#ctor
member.summary: constructor

member.name: P:DotNetEventingStrings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:DotNetEventingStrings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current threads CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:DotNetEventingStrings.ArgumentOutOfRange_NeedNonNegNum
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Non negative number is required.

member.name: P:DotNetEventingStrings.ArgumentOutOfRange_NeedValidId
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The ID parameter must be in the range {0} through {1}.

member.name: P:DotNetEventingStrings.ArgumentOutOfRange_MaxArgExceeded
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The total number of parameters must not exceed {0}.

member.name: P:DotNetEventingStrings.ArgumentOutOfRange_MaxStringsExceeded
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The number of String parameters must not exceed {0}.

member.name: P:DotNetEventingStrings.Argument_NeedNonemptyDelimiter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Delimiter cannot be an empty string.
